title: Certain Segtools functions break under Segway's mixture of Gaussians patch

content.raw:
Segway's mixture of Gaussians patch adds new GMTK structures (eg, the Gaussian mixture weights) to the input.master and params files. Therefore, certain Segtools functions will no longer work as expected (in particular, the ones that parse GMTK parameter files and expect a certain structure in their input; eg ```segtools-gmtk-parameters```).

In fixing these tools, it's also worth thinking about how to best visualise the model with a mixture of Gaussian components.
